class.name: PanoramaSky
class.brief_description: A type of [Sky] used to draw a background texture.
class.description: A resource referenced in an [Environment] that is used to draw a background. The Panorama sky functions similar to skyboxes in other engines except it uses a equirectangular sky map instead of a cube map.

members.member: [Texture] to be applied to the PanoramaSky.
